display_long_description:
# ★ Discode Link:  https://discord.gg/cAJShemkw2    
# Basketball: 
 Conquer the VR basketball court and win with precise shots. Experience realistic ball physics!  
# Archery:  
In VR archery, adjust for wind and distance to shoot arrows with precision and score high. 
[media]
 # Volleyball: 
  Enjoy a 2 vs 2 team volleyball game on a pro court. Compete against smart AI or real players for intense gameplay.  
# Billiards: 
 Play VR billiards, adjusting the angle and power of your shots to outsmart your opponent with a lifelike physics engine.
[media]
# Bowling:  
For the perfect game in VR bowling, adjust the angle and strength and beat more pins than your opponent.  
# Darts:  
Enjoy a VR darts game, competing with friends or practicing alone. 
[media]
# Tennis: 
 Play VR tennis on clay, grass, or hard courts, serving, volleying, and smashing with realistic physics.  
# Golf:  
Play VR golf on unique courses, perfecting your swing and competing in tournaments. 
[media]
# Squash: 
 Engage in fast-paced VR squash, competing on a professional court.  
# Baseball: 
Hit home runs and pitch fastballs in VR baseball, competing in various modes. 
[media]
 # Boxing:  
Step into the VR boxing ring, punching, dodging, and blocking in real time.  
# Beat Boxing: 
Exercise by punching to the music in Beat Boxing VR for an energetic workout.  
# Heavy Bag: 
 Practice boxing skills in VR, improving speed and strength. 
[media]
# PingPong:  
Play fast-paced VR table tennis, requiring precision and quick reflexes. 
[media]
